definitions.definition: To modify the firmware of an electronic device, especially a mobile phone , in order to remove restrictions that prevent it from running unofficial software.
To free a large language model from its ethical restrictions using prompt injection .
To score while short-handed in a league with the "jailbreak" rule.

secondary_definitions: ( transitive , computing ) To modify the firmware of an electronic device, especially a mobile phone , in order to remove restrictions that prevent it from running unofficial software.
( artificial intelligence ) To free a large language model from its ethical restrictions using prompt injection .
( ice hockey ) To score while short-handed in a league with the "jailbreak" rule.
